name: Night shot
description: This is a very fun, fast and simple game, both adults and children can play it. Each of the players has his own cowboy for whom you need to collect ammunition in order for him to shoot at your opponent.
minimum_requirements: OS: 64-bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 260 or ATI 4850 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: 64-bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 Processor: 2.5+ GHz Quad core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 or better, ATI 7950 or Storage: 500 MB available space
